content:
本件保存
司公力電灣台 TAIWAN POWER COMPANY 39 EAST HUO-PING ROAD SECTION I TAIPEI, TAIWAN, CHINA
CABLE ADDRESS: TAIPOWER
+
9-153
May 11, 1962
Mr. C. C. Chang, Chief Second Division Council for U. S. Aid Taipei
Subject: Surplus Property
Dear Mr. Chang:
We are in receipt of a letter reference MC-3599 dated May 9, 1962 from the Industrial Development Division of AID/C advising that surplus steel drill bits as indicated in the attached sheet are available at Jefferson City, Missouri. These equipment would be most useful at our Kukuan Project.
Please process requisition of these equipment for us.
Yours very truly, TAIWAN POWER COMPANY
Q. F. Hsu
C. F. Hsu Vice President
ENCL:
KNW/cph 1
51.5. 11
09302 V.O.
S.a. 2
CUSA
412
國史饭 Academia Historica

We are in receipt of a letter reference MC-3599 dated May 9, 1962 from the Industrial Development Division of AID/C advising that surplus steel drill bits as indicated in the attached sheet are available at Jefferson City, Missouri. These equipment would be most useful at our Kukuan Project.
